channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Park bins not fit for purpose, 23rd June
item.description:
Regularly have to pick up and return rubbish that has been taken out of the bins by birds/animals. Please install animal proof bins. The rubbish ends up in the water and eco system.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57b Marle Hill Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of bin for rubbish, 23rd June
item.description:
Despite three bins being in close proximity to the shops there needs to be a bin on the green. Perhaps relocating one of the bins would help? Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Lynworth Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath narrow due to overgrown foliage, 23rd June
item.description:
The over grown weeds has made the footpath very narrow making this a bottleneck for walkers/runners and cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Orchard Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to electric post next to street light, 23rd June
item.description:
Damage (cause unknown) to post next to street light, looks like there are wires exposed making this a potential safety issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Welland Lodge Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oil Spillage on roundabout, 23rd June
item.description:
Large spillage of oil directly on the roundabout. Its been there for > week and some vehicles have trafficked the spill and spread it out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 72 Sunrise Avenue, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Keeps coming back, 23rd June
item.description:
Because you never fix the road properly this hole keeps getting bigger and bigger and bigger at the edges where you don’t repair it. Please fix it properly this has been going on for several years now. There is an even bigger pothole and deeper Pothole directly across the road from this. Please fix them all urgently. This is a narrow road and if people avoid these potholes there will be a crash

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Graffiti

item.title: Dumped tyres, 22nd June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Dunalley Parade, Cheltenham

item.title: Fresh painting on planter at Edinburgh Place, 22nd June
item.description:
Makes the place look a mess. Can someone paint over it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Sochi Mews, Cheltenham

item.title: Tall grass growing in the gutter, 22nd June
item.description:
Tall grass growing in the gutters around this area. Makes the area look run down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 92 Paygrove Lane, Longlevens

item.title: Hole in road next to hole filled recently, 21st June
item.description:
You couldn't make this up really, fill/fix a small section concrete road where the joins are only for the damage to appear immediately next to the hole repaired. Why are these issues not corrected first time?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Lynworth Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden toys across the green, 21st June
item.description:
Unsightly and blocks route through
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Holly Court, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights do nothing, 21st June
item.description:
Pointless lights do not stop traffic until everything has passed and there is no traffic. Waste of time using them in this configuration.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): St Thomas More Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Glass on footpath/cycleway under bridge, 21st June
item.description:
Large quantity of smashed glass under bridge near railway station.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Queen's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: The path is overgrown with weeds and grass, 20th June
item.description:
Can you arrange for someone to come and clear the path as it is very overgrown? This stretches from just outside the Gloucester Road entrance to Andoversford along to the bus stop just past the turning to Whittington.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous road surface, 19th June
item.description:
From the top of the hill by the junction down wards for 300 metres the road has broken up to such an extent that it is becoming unusuable for both bikes and cars The road is in a terrible state with numerous pot holes, I used the term road generously! It is no longer safe to cycle on as it has become too dangerous, someone will have a serious accident due to the neglect of the road. I see that this has been reported previously but cannot see any evidence of remedial work or risk mitigation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture left around bus stop, 19th June
item.description:
Random pieces of garden furniture left over paths around bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3-5 Lynworth Exchange Mendip Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
